name: Photography & Video
description: Capture your special moments with our professional photography and video services.
detailed_description: Our photography and video services go beyond capturing moments; they tell the story of your love. With a focus on creativity and professionalism, we ensure that your wedding memories are preserved in the most beautiful way possible. From candid shots to cinematic videos, we capture every detail that makes your day unique.

name: Beauty & Makeup
description: Enhance your natural beauty with our expert beauty and makeup services for the bride and bridal party.
detailed_description: Our beauty and makeup services are designed to make you look and feel your best on your special day. Our skilled makeup artists work with you to create a personalized look that enhances your natural beauty. Whether you prefer a classic or modern style, we ensure you radiate confidence and elegance.

name: Wedding Cake
description: Indulge in exquisite wedding cakes designed to match your theme and taste preferences.
detailed_description: Our wedding cakes are not just delicious; they are a work of art. From classic to contemporary designs, we create cakes that complement your wedding theme. Choose from a variety of flavors and fillings to delight your guests' taste buds. Our delivery and setup services ensure a stress-free experience on your big day.

name: Catering
description: Delight your guests with a delectable spread of dishes tailored to your wedding style and preferences.
detailed_description: Our catering services are dedicated to making your wedding feast memorable. With customizable menu options and attention to dietary restrictions, we ensure that every guest enjoys a delicious meal. Our professional catering staff takes care of every detail, leaving you free to savor the moments with your loved ones.

name: Jewellery
description: Adorn yourself with exquisite bridal jewelry, enhancing your elegance on your special day.
detailed_description: Our bridal jewelry collection is crafted with precision and passion. From handcrafted pieces to customizable designs, we offer a range of options to suit your style. Elevate your elegance with our bridal jewelry sets that add a touch of sophistication to your wedding attire.

name: Wedding Flowers
description: Transform your venue with beautiful floral arrangements, adding a touch of nature to your celebration.
detailed_description: Our wedding flower services bring the beauty of nature to your celebration. From custom floral designs that match your theme to venue decoration services, we create an enchanting atmosphere. Walk down the aisle surrounded by the fragrance of beautiful floral arches and carry a bouquet that reflects the romance of your special day.
